Package positiveVariabilityManagement

Class NewContextsSynthesizer

java.lang.Object
positiveVariabilityManagement.NewContextsSynthesizer
public class NewContextsSynthesizer extends Object
Functionality to synthesize the product with new functionality incorporated into existing one The core of synthesis process of functionality/features related to positive variability
Author:
Jakub Perdek

    Description
    private String
    getMarkerName(org.json.simple.JSONObject entryJSONObject)
    Returns the name of the positive variability marker if found otherwise null
    private void
    integrateImports(org.json.simple.JSONObject newApplicationAst, VariationPointsContentInjection variationPointsContentInjection)
    Integrates the imports into synthesized base code/script -dependencies in for of imports are extracted from each code fragment and used to update the imports in existing synthesized script/application -the imports are optionally integrated into the base script as imports (for testing using HTML template the other mechanism is used - dependencies are imported as script)

    processPossiblePositiveVariationPointPlace(org.json.simple.JSONObject astTemplatePart, String contextIdentifier, org.json.simple.JSONArray contextArray, VariationPointsContentInjection variationPointsContentInjection)

    Synthesizes the selected configuration among code constructs in place of selected variation points (modeling also crosscutting features) -optionally the resulting projects/products are directly generated if processDirectly parameter is set to true

  • Constructor Details

    • NewContextsSynthesizer

      public NewContextsSynthesizer(FeatureSelectionStrategy featureSelectionStrategy, FeatureConstructsSelectionStrategy featureConstructsSelectionStrategy, CodeIncrementGranularityManagementStrategy codeIncrementGranularityManagementStrategy, SelectionOfConstructsAcrossSelectedVariationPointsStrategies selectionOfConstructsSelectionStrategies, DerivationResourcesManager derivationResourcesManager, String syntetizedContentName)
      Instantiates the functionality for the synthesis of the product with new functionality
      Parameters:
      featureSelectionStrategy - - the strategy to select positive variability variation points to be updated
      featureConstructsSelectionStrategy - - the strategy to select code constructs in place of variation points
      codeIncrementGranularityManagementStrategy - - the strategy to manage code synthesis into more modular units
      selectionOfConstructsSelectionStrategies - - the strategy to select constructs across various variation points
      derivationResourcesManager - - the resource manager holding resources for derivation process
      syntetizedContentName - - the name of synthesized content

  • Method Details

    • selectContexts

      private Map<String,VariationPointContentsInjection> selectContexts(List<PositiveVariationPointCandidateTemplates> positiveVariationPointCandidatesTemplates) throws AlreadyMappedVariationPointContentsInjection
      Creates/models code contexts for further synthesis -selects variation points which should be updated and particular construct/constructs for each of them -the feature selection strategy is used for this purpose
      Parameters:
      positiveVariationPointCandidatesTemplates - - the list of features/positive variation points representation that will be selected
      Returns:
      the map of variation point identifier to functionality that can be injected into this particular variation points
      Throws:
      AlreadyMappedVariationPointContentsInjection

    • selectConstructs

      private List<CodeFragment> selectConstructs(PositiveVariationPointCandidate positiveVariationPointConstructCandidate, PositiveVariationPointCandidateTemplates selectedTemplate)
      Selects constructs that can be substituted for processed/actually focused variation point
      Parameters:
      positiveVariationPointConstructCandidate - - the entity containing code construct candidates that can enhance existing functionality in place of actually focused variation point
      selectedTemplate - - features/positive variation points representation from which available constructs are extracted/obtained
      Returns:
      the list of code fragments for further selections and synthesis, which holding all decisions (selections, structural information)

    • showPrintedCode

      private void showPrintedCode(CodeFragment granularityShapedCodeFragment)
      Prints/outputs the code as string from the code fragment - CodeFragmet instance
      Parameters:
      granularityShapedCodeFragment - - the instance with information about particular code fragment

    • selectAndSynthetizeContexts

      public List<SynthesizedContent> selectAndSynthetizeContexts(org.json.simple.JSONObject astRoot, List<PositiveVariationPointCandidateTemplates> positiveVariationPointCandidatesTemplates, boolean processDirectly) throws IOException, InterruptedException, InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException, VariationPointPlaceInArrayNotFound, UnknownResourceToProcessException, AlreadyMappedVariationPointContentsInjection
      The selection and synthesis of particular contexts according to the configured strategies
      Parameters:
      astRoot - - the root of AST
      positiveVariationPointCandidatesTemplates - - the list of features/positive variation points representation that will be selected
      processDirectly - - if true the contexts are synthesized immediately after their selection and all preparations
      Returns:
      the list of synthesized contexts, but always the null is returned
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException
      InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException
      VariationPointPlaceInArrayNotFound
      UnknownResourceToProcessException
      AlreadyMappedVariationPointContentsInjection

    • getMarkerName

      private String getMarkerName(org.json.simple.JSONObject entryJSONObject)
      Returns the name of the positive variability marker if found otherwise null
      Parameters:
      entryJSONObject - - the AST with declared variables which are checked for the presence of positive variability marker
      Returns:
      the name of the marker if found otherwise null

    • processPossiblePositiveVariationPointPlace

      private void processPossiblePositiveVariationPointPlace(org.json.simple.JSONObject astTemplatePart, String contextIdentifier, org.json.simple.JSONArray contextArray, VariationPointsContentInjection variationPointsContentInjection) throws IOException, InterruptedException, VariationPointPlaceInArrayNotFound
      Processes particular variation point and injects the selected code constructs
      Parameters:
      astTemplatePart - - the AST part of the template/original code (is not modified) possibly with the particular positive variation point marker
      contextIdentifier - - the unique context identifier
      contextArray - - the JSON array of particular contexts
      variationPointsContentInjection - - the all related information for injection into specified variation point
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException
      VariationPointPlaceInArrayNotFound

    • searchForPositiveVariabilityVariationPointMarkers

      private void searchForPositiveVariabilityVariationPointMarkers(org.json.simple.JSONObject astTemplatePart, org.json.simple.JSONObject astPart, VariationPointsContentInjection variationPointsContentInjection) throws IOException, InterruptedException, InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException, VariationPointPlaceInArrayNotFound
      Iterates over the template AST (from base code) and injects the functionality (code constructs) on selected places (variation points)
      Parameters:
      astTemplatePart - - the AST part of the template/original code (is not modified) possibly with the particular positive variation point marker
      astPart - - the AST part equivalent to the original AST part for the code synthesis (recursion is not dependent on it)
      variationPointsContentInjection - - the all related information for injection into specified variation point
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException
      InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException
      VariationPointPlaceInArrayNotFound

    • integrateImports

      private void integrateImports(org.json.simple.JSONObject newApplicationAst, VariationPointsContentInjection variationPointsContentInjection) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Integrates the imports into synthesized base code/script -dependencies in for of imports are extracted from each code fragment and used to update the imports in existing synthesized script/application -the imports are optionally integrated into the base script as imports (for testing using HTML template the other mechanism is used - dependencies are imported as script)
      Parameters:
      newApplicationAst - - the root of synthesized AST to insert/integrate all related imports
      variationPointsContentInjection - - the all related information for injection into specified variation point
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException

    • updateAstTreeAccordingInformationFromVariationPoints

      private void updateAstTreeAccordingInformationFromVariationPoints(org.json.simple.JSONObject templateAstRoot, org.json.simple.JSONObject newApplicationAst, VariationPointsContentInjection variationPointsContentInjection) throws IOException, InterruptedException, InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException, VariationPointPlaceInArrayNotFound
      Searches for selected places and inserts selected constructs into synthesized AST
      Parameters:
      templateAstRoot - - the AST part of the template/original code (is not modified) possibly with the particular positive variation point marker
      newApplicationAst - - the root of synthesized AST to insert/integrate all related imports
      variationPointsContentInjection - - the all related information for injection into specified variation point
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException
      InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException
      VariationPointPlaceInArrayNotFound

    • synthesizeContexts

      public List<SynthesizedContent> synthesizeContexts(org.json.simple.JSONObject templateAstRoot, Map<String,VariationPointContentsInjection> functionalityOnVarPointsToPossibilitiesMap, boolean processDirectly) throws IOException, InterruptedException, InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException, VariationPointPlaceInArrayNotFound, UnknownResourceToProcessException
      Synthesizes the selected configuration among code constructs in place of selected variation points (modeling also crosscutting features) -optionally the resulting projects/products are directly generated if processDirectly parameter is set to true
      Parameters:
      templateAstRoot - - the AST part of the template/original code (is not modified) possibly with the particular positive variation point marker
      functionalityOnVarPointsToPossibilitiesMap - - the mapping of variation points names to selected constructs on their places
      processDirectly - - if true the contexts are synthesized immediately after their selection and all preparations
      Returns:
      the list of synthesized content for their further serialization if processDirectly is set to true
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException
      InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException
      VariationPointPlaceInArrayNotFound
      UnknownResourceToProcessException
